refnamediv.refpurpose: Gets the value of a configuration option

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the value of the configuration option on success. Failure, such as querying for a non-existant value, will return an empty string.

note.title: When querying boolean values
note.para: A boolean ini value of off will be returned as an empty string while a boolean ini value of on will be returned as "1".

note.title: When querying memory size values

refsect1.para: See also get_cfg_var, ini_get_all, ini_alter, ini_restore, and ini_set
